text: Saint-Imier is a municipality of the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. Saint-Imier is the hometown of the Longines watchmaking company. The Breitling watchmaking company was founded in Saint-Imier, but moved to Grenchen, Canton of Solothurn. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of the municipality of Saint-Imier Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois
title: Saint-Imier
